name: Hopelast
description:
movements:

W-jump/climb

A/D-run

S-moving downward during gliding

space-gliding

Hopelast is a pixel art platformer where the player can run, jump, climb and glide through mid air. The game shows two stories occurred in same place but in different timeline. The game soon will be released on steam. Hope you guys have a short wonderful experience.

ps: if the player doesn't move please click the screen of the game
